channel.title: Hangs Whonix update installation at 67%, VB Debian 10 why?
channel.description: Whonix hangs at 67% during the installation of the update I write sudo apt update, after sudo apt dist-upgrade - the installation goes and then stops, always 67%. Tried the same thing through the previous version of VirtualBox 6.0. VirtualBox is installed on Debian 10 A screenshot of the console at the time the installation stopped:![](https://i.imgur.com/YXXbY1b.png)

item.title: Hangs Whonix update installation at 67%, VB Debian 10 why?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Generally:

Whonix – 8 Dec 20

Follow Whonix ™ Developments

It is absolutely crucial to subscribe to and read the latest Whonix ™ news category 'important-news' to stay in touch with ongoing developments. This way users benefit from notifications concerning important security vulnerabilities, potential...

Specifically:

Whonix XFCE for VirtualBox users: RAM increase required News
Releases of Whonix-Gateway XFCE prior build version 15.0.0.8.9: Virtual (VM) RAM increase to 1280 MB RAM advised. [1] Otherwise APT upgrades might freeze during module building (VirtualBox guest additions) as well as kernel header package upgrade. [2] To change RAM setting: Power off the virtual machine. Open VirtualBox. Go to VirtualBox machine settings → System → Base Memory → Increase RAM by moving the slider or type 1280. Ignore message about invalid graphics controller VMSVGA because, …

Also:

Whonix – 9 Oct 20

Recommended VirtualBox Version for use with Whonix ™

It is highly recommended to use the recommended VirtualBox version for use with Whonix ™. Otherwise there can be issues.

Whonix – 4 Dec 20

Whonix ™ in VirtualBox - Troubleshooting - Whonix ™ does not Start?

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS. / VERR_VMX_MSR_VMXON_DISABLED / VERR_SSM_FIELD_NOT_CONSECUTIVE / supR3HardenedWinReSpawn / Enable VT-x in BIOS / Aborted Status / Guru Mediation

Read full topic
item.source: Hangs Whonix update installation at 67%, VB Debian 10 why?

item.title: Hangs Whonix update installation at 67%, VB Debian 10 why?
item.dc:creator: wordl2020
item.description:
Whonix hangs at 67% during the installation of the update
I write sudo apt update, after sudo apt dist-upgrade - the installation goes and then stops, always 67%.
Tried the same thing through the previous version of VirtualBox 6.0.
VirtualBox is installed on Debian 10
A screenshot of the console at the time the installation stopped:
